process.name: Test Permission Applied To SubProcesses
process.narrative: An automated test is needed for the following simple scenario. This will verify that permissions applied to a role and a user are retained upon closing the application as opposed to just logging out of the current session. The test is important as it will verify that closing the caching solution that has been put in place does not cause issues with permissions

input.name: New Password
input.narrative: If this is your first login it will prompt you to change the password.

input.name: Select Item Method?
input.narrative: True by Default. Selects the node from system tab using Select Item approach. If the node is not available (Greyed out) an exception will be thrown. Use this method if you are certain the node is available for selection.

input.name: Retry MouseClick?
input.narrative: Default to True. Retries Global Mouse Click up to 3 times.

input.name: Clean Up?
input.narrative: False by Default. Set True if clean up is required at the beginning of the Action.

stage.name: RequiredAccessWarning
stage.initialvalue: This process cannot be saved because you do not have permission to execute all linked processes or business objects. Please either remove the affected links or contact your administrator to obtain permission.
